wikipedia_page.main: Maryam Hashemi (Persian: مریم هاشمی) (born 1977) is an Iranian visual artist based at Hackney Wick in East London. Often working in pencil, watercolour or acrylic paint.

link_mentions.page: List of painters by name beginning with "H"

response: *Maryam Hashemi (born 1977), visual artist based in London
